section.heading: Tax on estates and trusts — Effect of residence or situs of fiduciary.
section.text: The residence or situs of the fiduciary shall not control the classification of estates and trusts as resident or nonresident under the provisions of § 47-1809.01.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 347, ch. 258, art. I, title IX, § 2
